desc: Coffee with dense & persistent creaminess, full body & fragrant aroma; available as coffee beans, ground coffee, Nespresso® & Dolce Gusto® compatible capsules.

layout.text:
Coffee with Dense & Persistent Creaminess, Full Body & Fragrant Aroma.
Available as Coffee Beans, Ground Coffee, Nespresso® & Dolce Gusto® compatible capsules.
